Detailed Description

A fixture definition is used to create a fixture. This class defines an abstract fixture definition. You can reuse fixture definitions safely.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

b2FixtureDef::b2FixtureDef (  )  [inline]

The constructor sets the default fixture definition values.

virtual b2FixtureDef::~b2FixtureDef (  )  [inline, virtual]

Member Data Documentation

float32 b2FixtureDef::density

The density, usually in kg/m^2.

b2Filter b2FixtureDef::filter

Contact filtering data.

float32 b2FixtureDef::friction

The friction coefficient, usually in the range [0,1].

bool b2FixtureDef::isSensor

A sensor shape collects contact information but never generates a collision response.

float32 b2FixtureDef::restitution

The restitution (elasticity) usually in the range [0,1].

const b2Shape* b2FixtureDef::shape

The shape, this must be set. The shape will be cloned, so you can create the shape on the stack.

void* b2FixtureDef::userData

Use this to store application specific fixture data.
